docs.snippet: A Tennessee woman will face criminal charges in the death of a Metro Nashville police officer who slipped into a bitterly cold river while trying to save her, police said Friday....

headline.main: Police: Woman to Face Homicide Charge in Officer's Death

docs.snippet: Volkswagen's former Chairman Ferdinand Piech, who left the company following a showdown with ex-Chief Executive Martin Winterkorn in 2015, has testified to prosecutors investigating Winterkorn's involvement in the carmaker's diesel scandal, accord...

headline.main: Ex-VW Chairman Piech Testifies in Winterkorn Probe
